src:
Milojević: Ovo je nivo više, Poketino: Bilo je sjajno iskustvo igrati ovde
06 Nov 2019, 23:31 by Milos
Totenhem je odneo bodove iz Beograda, a Crvenoj zvezdi po svemu sudeći preostaje da se u naredna dva kola bori sa Olimpijakosom za treće mesto i plasman u Ligu Evrope.
Strateg Crvene zvezde Vladan Milojević pohvalio je protivnika, ali i svoju ekipu, koja može da izvuče dosta pouka iz ovog meča.
– Sve u svemu Totenhem je zasluženo pobedio. Fantastična, brza ekipa. Pokušali smo da im pariramo i skratimo prostor. Ali, jednostavno to je njihov kvalitet. Nemam šta da zamerim svojim igračima. Ipak, je ovo nivo više. Rezultat nije dobar, ali možemo da izvučemo dosta pouka i da gradimo budućnost. Ima još dosta da se igra, daćemo sve od sebe. Imamo još mnogo da treniramo i da napredujemo. Hvala navijačima, rekao je Milojević.
Menadžer „pevaca“ Mauricio Poketino istakao je atmosferu i naglasio da je ova pobeda veoma značajna za njegov tim po pitanju samopouzdanja.
– U fudbalu se nikad ne zna. Imali su šanse. Mi smo koristili naše šanse. Važno je da smo igrali na potrebnom nivou, na nivou na kojem smo odigrali i u Londonu. Atmosfera je bila fantastična. Bilo je sjajno iskustvo igrati ovde, podsetila me je atmosfera na dane u Argentini. Ovakva pobeda će nam vratiti samopouzadanje, dodao je Argentinac.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Milojevic: This is a higher level, Poketino: It was a great experience playing here
06 Nov 2019, 23:31 by Milos
Tottenham took away points from Belgrade, with Red Star appearing to be struggling with Olympiakos in the next two rounds for third place and European League standings.
Red Star strategist Vladan Milojevic praised his opponent as well as his team, which can draw a lot of lessons from this match.
- Overall Tottenham deservedly won. Fantastic, fast team. We tried to pair them and shorten the space. But simply it's their quality. I have nothing to blame on my players. Still, this is a higher level. The result is not good, but we can draw a lot of lessons and build the future. There's a lot more to play, we'll do our best. We still have a lot to train and move forward. Thanks to the fans, Milojevic said.
Singer manager Mauricio Poketino emphasized the atmosphere and emphasized that this victory is very significant for his team in terms of confidence.
- You never know about football. They had a chance. We used our chances. It is important that we have played at the required level, at the level at which we have played in London. The atmosphere was fantastic. It was a great experience playing here, I was reminded of the atmosphere of the days in Argentina. Such a victory will restore our self-confidence, the Argentine added.
